problem.title: The problem isn't your willpower
problem.text1: Apps are designed by teams of engineers to capture your attention. Notifications, infinite feeds, algorithms... everything is optimized to bring you back.
problem.text2: HoldOn doesn't judge you. HoldOn simply gives you a moment to pause.

features.title: How does it work?
features.subtitle: Simple. Kind. Effective.
features.step1_text: Select the apps you want to pause before opening (social media, games, etc.)
features.step2_text: When you open a targeted app, a meditative screen appears for a few seconds with a mindfulness exercise.
features.step3_text: After the pause, you choose: continue to the app or return to the present moment. It's your decision.

meditations.title: 3 types of meditations
meditations.subtitle: Each app opening is a new opportunity to refocus
meditations.breathing_text: Follow the gently pulsing circle. Inhale as it grows, exhale as it contracts.
meditations.sounds_text: Close your eyes for a moment and identify three distinct sounds around you.
meditations.sensations_text: Reconnect with your body. Feel your feet on the ground, your hands, your breathing.

science.title: Why does it work?
science.subtitle: An approach validated by neuroscience research
science.card1_text: Between the stimulus (wanting to open Instagram) and the response (opening it), there's a space. By creating a pause of a few seconds, HoldOn expands this space and allows you to consciously choose rather than react automatically.
science.card2_text: Studies show that even short mindfulness practices (less than 10 minutes) significantly reduce impulsive behaviors and improve self-regulation.
science.card3_text: When you have to confirm your choice to open an app, you switch from "autopilot" mode to conscious mode. This simple friction is often enough to break the automatic cycle.
science.card3_cite: — BJ Fogg, Stanford Behavior Design Lab
science.card4_text: Slow, deep breathing activates the parasympathetic nervous system, reducing the stress and anxiety that often drive us to seek distraction on our phones.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.commitment_text: At HoldOn, we take your privacy very seriously. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. This privacy policy explains how our application works regarding data.
privacy.summary_1: No data is sent to our servers
privacy.summary_5: All your data stays on your device
privacy.section1_text2: HoldOn does not collect any personal data. The application works entirely locally on your Android device. We don't have a server that receives your information, and we don't even know that you're using our application.
privacy.section2_intro: To function, HoldOn stores some information only on your device:
privacy.section2_item1: List of selected apps — The apps you've chosen to monitor
privacy.section2_item2: Preferences — Pause duration, language, preferred meditation type
privacy.section2_item3: Pause counter — The number of times you've taken a pause
privacy.section2_item4: Premium status — Whether you've made the in-app purchase
privacy.section2_item5: Usage data (optional) — If you enable the "Usage Access" permission:
privacy.section2_item5_sub1: Total screen time per app (before and after using HoldOn)
privacy.section2_item5_sub2: Number of app openings per day
privacy.section2_item5_sub3: This data is calculated and stored only on your device to generate your personal statistics
privacy.section2_item5_sub4: It is never transmitted to our servers or shared with third parties
privacy.section2_outro: This data never leaves your phone. If you uninstall the application, it is automatically deleted.
privacy.section3_intro: HoldOn requires certain Android permissions to function. Here's why:
privacy.section3_perm1_text: This permission allows HoldOn to detect when you open a monitored app. We do not use this permission to read the content of your apps, only to detect when they're opened.
privacy.section3_perm2_text: This permission is optional. It allows HoldOn to retrieve your screen time locally to generate comparative statistics (your usage before and after using the app). This data is never shared and stays on your phone.
privacy.section3_limits_intro: These permissions are used exclusively for the features described above. We never:
privacy.section3_limits_1: Read the content of your apps (messages, emails, etc.)
privacy.section4_text: In-app purchases are handled by Google Play. We don't have access to your payment information (credit card, etc.). Google only transmits an anonymized purchase confirmation that allows us to unlock premium features.
privacy.section5_item1: RevenueCat — For managing in-app purchase infrastructure. RevenueCat processes purchase receipts (transmitted by Google Play) to validate your Premium status. This data is linked to an anonymous installation identifier and is not cross-referenced with your personal data.
privacy.section5_outro: We don't use any analytics, advertising, or tracking services. If the app crashes, the Android system may send anonymous technical reports (crash logs) via the Google Play Console to help us fix bugs. These reports don't contain any personal data.
privacy.section6_intro: No data is used for commercial purposes.
privacy.section6_text1: Data stored locally on your device (see section 2) is used only to:
privacy.section6_use1: Make the application work (detect apps, display meditations)
privacy.section6_use2: Provide you with your personal progress statistics
privacy.section6_never3: Sell or share your information with third parties
privacy.section6_never5: Any other purpose than those listed above
privacy.section7_text: HoldOn is not specifically directed at children under 13. However, since we don't collect any data, there's no risk to minors' privacy.
privacy.section8_text1: Since we don't collect any data about you, the rights of access, rectification, deletion, and data portability (GDPR) don't apply — there's simply nothing to provide you.
privacy.section8_text2: If you uninstall the application, all local data is automatically deleted from your device.
privacy.section9_text1: If we modify this privacy policy, we will update the date at the top of this page.
privacy.section9_text2: For significant changes (modification of data collection, new permissions, new third-party services), we will:
privacy.section9_major1: Notify you via an in-app notification at least 30 days before it takes effect
privacy.section9_major2: Display a clear summary of the changes in the app
privacy.section9_major3: Give you the option to decline the new terms (which may result in stopping use of the app if the changes are essential to operation)
privacy.section9_text3: Minor changes (typo corrections, clarifications without impact on your rights) will take effect upon publication.
